short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will promote Facebook posts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a "Promote post" button to each Facebook post of an organization to promote and share the content of the post with an advertisement agency. On click of the button plugin sends specific data of the post to the agency, which can promote the post as a banner on other websites using Facebook API.
